title: Any way to get 14 orange essence?
body:
Just curious, I got pentakill morde shard(been wanting it for awhile)
and i got rid of my all star akali and sir kled skin shards to get it, only to find I was 14 orange essence off, any way I get get orange essence quickly?

replies.body: plss can i get 14 for surgeon shen ineed it somuch shen is my main
We can't make it rain essence, but if you ever did need a small amount of RP hit us up with some artwork and we can work something out!
alrighty then, artwork incoming!(jk, i don't need rp, I only have like, 40 lol)

Hah no worries! Feel free to take advantage of this little program whenever you need. You can always post it here with the amount of RP you need (keep in under like....50 or so) and post the artwork, or shoot it over in a ticket ^_^.
